content: Seems simple enough
It is good. I am still learning about it.
Just purchased and entering my cards. So far so good.

Very handy. Keeps track of card usage and payments. I have three cards, and it gets tiring going to their site it app to check the balance or see if a payment has posted. With this, I can keep track of all three in one app.

Please add 3 decimals for some Currencies (Example 0.000) with ability to use a separate currency for each individual card. I am using cards with 2 different currencies. Please reply to this message as I am not getting any feedback from you.
Starting to love this app. It's helping me pay down credit cards and manage my money
Really useful, a must have for anyone whonhas several credit cards makes you management fuss free.
I have too many credit cards, this is the only app that I have found to keep up with them and let me know when they are due

This app provides the exact functionality I needed. It provides you a view of all your credit cards, due dates, manual entry of transactions and a quick view of which credit card provides max grace period. Like it!
It's a great way to keep all your Credit card information digitally organized but if you want to track your spending you'll need to add every transaction manually
Simple but effective. Gets the job done.

Using it for more than a year now and still a 5 star app! For me it's a must have app if you monitor your credit cards to keep on track. No fuzz and user-friendly. Data backup/restore is also a plus. Kudos to the dev team behind it!
Great
Helpful
Easy & straight. Forward
Best credit card spending log
Awesome 👌 app with simple user interface
I like that it is offline and it is so easy to use.
Almost fit my expectation. Should have more options for installment plan so I can give 5 stars.
Nice
Needto understand more!
Good app

This app is a helpful way of keeping track of credit cards! It is great being able to see all you cards in one place and to be aware of spending. The labels are easy to follow, too! Maybe it's inevitable, the only downside though is plugging in info manually.
Does what I need it to would give 5 stars but would like it to be able to set a recurring payment and a payoff calculator prediction

A solid app to keep things clean. I use it only to keep track of what cards I have, and limits on them. I was looking for an app just to keep track of cards without displaying or entering card numbers. This is it.
Helps me to be more responsible and accurate in my spending
So far so good. Still learning my way around.... Will review in a little more detail in a few weeks
Goodjob to developer. Worth it keeping up monitor my spending for my credit cards accurately.
Excellent app..very useful!!!
This is by far the greatest app tomonitor your card transactions Thumbs up 👍 Keep up the good work
Straightforward. Best app to monitor multiple cards. I do wish they add some data trends chart and option to know the trends of my spending across the cards.

Confused. I've been using the free version and decided to upgrade to pro. The pro version did not upgrade the free version, so now I have two managers with, it appears, no way to get all of my cards and transactions into the pro version. Do not want to have to type them in all over again. Is there a way to do this-- or a support forum?
Very interesting app!
Very useful app.
First of all I love the app, its a grt utility. would be great if we can have an option to add the emi transactions as well.
Love it.
Amazingly simple and effective app...if an old fart like me can figure it out, its gotta be easy-peasy! forget the free app, jump to the pro version!

It is a nice app to monitor your credit card purchases. However, it would have been much better if I could be able to have the total amount of purchases automatically deducted to my income so that i will know if I will still have enough money left before the due date of all my credit cards.It will also be much useful, if I can separate the purchases of my other friends who are using my cardsm have a separate total amount they need to pay and not included in deduction from income
replyContent: Your friends should apply their own credit cards lol. The income idea is good though, thanks for the idea will give it some thought :)

content: App maintains all cards regardless if Debit or credit. Also alerts you when expiration date is expiring. Samsung Galaxy S8 plus
Great offline CC Management app, was confused and support hooked me up and guided me in the right down. Highly recommended !!
like it

Well done you show the way regards responsability and the app itself although not used extensively yet ...seems to me about right as far as should be gone with the sensitive nature of the content .It not only gave me what i was looking for .It also told me through your willingness to respond repeatedly to reviews left what i should be looking for and just in time because in another app i was just about to give all my details out.The fact this app was for own use shows . PURCHASED WITH THANKS 5*
well done! love it!
so far it's really good, I just wish instructions were clearer. I'm not sure how to put in how much is owed for each card so I do it as a transaction but I feel it's not right.
Good. Please attach fingerprint
replyContent: Do you mean automatically add transaction from incoming message (sms)? It has just been added in the latest version. It can be enabled in Settings page.

content: Does a pretty good job on managing expenses. I feel instructions on certain features could be better, also when upgrading to paid you have to save data and reload you avoid losing all the information
very handy and non-hassle

So far so good! I forgot to backup before switching from Free to Pro version. But no biggie, I only had a few data to retype. I hope future upgrades would include ability to save and print using spreadsheet 😉
new in this, hope it helps me in keeping record of my credit card usage.
excellent app
So far I like app. it serves the purpose.

Love the app, but I have one problem I'd like to see rectified. The period between my statement and payment is actually 45 days (6 weeks). So, for example, if my statement date is the 15th of Dec, while the payment date is the 5th, transactions after the 15th of this month won't be due until the 5th of Feb (6 weeks later). An option to set the payment date with a 1 or 2 month grace would be ideal. Otherwise, great app.

Muy buena aplicación, pero una pregunta.. si mi tarjeta corta con 10,000 y después de la fecha de corte tengo otros consumos, luego hago un pago de 4,000, porque cuando voy a la opcion de incoming payment due continúan apareciendo los 10,000? No debería aparecer 6,000 en esta parte de la aplicación?
Indespensible. Thank you for creating this.
I don't know much about this app

Hi... 2 thoughts 1) It would be good if this app could also track debit cards as well and have the option to see both credit and debit cards together or see just credit cards or debit cards. It could also use a widget. 2. Some of my credit cards have 23 or 25 or 28 day grace periods. Does the app figure that out or could there be a way to input that? Lastly could it keep track of which card to use to have the longest grace period and to maintain a certain percent utilization on each card? I'd pay more to have all those features
The best app there is. Great monitoring app for my cards. Minimizes over spending. A must have app for credit card holders!
Good app
Nice app , would be great if you could implement the auto record transactions properly like walnut app

I was looking for a very simple interface to force myself to pay attention to how much I was charging to my credit card. I seem to have found it here: a very nice stand-alone app that lets me keep track of expenses and debits on as many different cards as I'd like to input. It doesn't try to sync with my bank or card providers. It doesn't help me track my whole budget. It doesn't store my credit card information. It's very simple, clean, effective and perfect at what it does.
Good but need to devolap few option.

Have been using for a year. Reliable app but over time, it's still hard to keep track of my expenditures and the accuracy of the CC balance, due to the rebates and transactions I've missed out. Kudos to the keeping track on SMS. Overall great app.
Nice app. Needs some improvements though.
Works well as a reminder.
Very good for simple accounting of receipts. Would like to see it store receipt images on the SD card. Would also like to open the app to the transactions a rather than the credit cards page
replyContent: Thanks for your review and valuable feedbacks!

content: Really helps to quickly and easily manage my credit card balance
Great app, price should be lowered so that everyone can afford it.
Very useful for me, thanks
A great and simple app. Couldn't transfer data when moving to the pro version. Had to reenter data manually. Since that's done fine.
replyContent: Thanks for dropping me an email. I suspect it is due to your phone having both free version and pro version running at the same time. You have marked payment on the pro version but the free version is showing the reminders. Please uninstall the free version after you're sure that all the data has been backed up and migrated over. Cheers!

content:
It was working well, and I loved it. But since I changed to the Huawei P20 
pro, the auto transaction no longer work. Please fix it, this is one of the 
reason why I purchase the product license

I am using this Credit Card Manager Pro version. Using I realize few functions could have been made better or enabling some functions.  I am summarizing those as   1. It will be really great if this app has an option of reading the older SMS. 2. How older SMS will be read there will be an option for specifying it. 3. Automatically it will record the entries of different credit card      and also will have the smart technology or logic to figure out the duplicate entries. 4. Settlement of the credit card payment could be finalized form the SMS and maybe it can ask for approving it. 5. Reading of the Amex card it would have smarter technology as AMEX card have a 15 digits number and bank sometimes send as either last three digits or last five digits. For 5 digit it is working fine but for 3 digits it fails to detect.     It would be better if 3 digits also can be considered for automatic entries. 6. Multiple cards need to have a sorting option with respect to various parameters such as due date, card variant, expiry date, credit limits etc. 7. There would be an option of dragging the card entries and changing the row sequence.

App is good been using it in a while. Very useful app to monitor my cards. 
All transactions can be added and you can cross reference it against your 
bill to ensure its tally.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to write a review. Glad that you find the app useful!

content: Awesome tracker
replyContent: glad that you like it :)

This app is really good to keep track your credit card but.. Can you add

replyContent: If you're talking about credit transaction which is a refund, you can quickly add a new category called Refund, then use it for all your refunds :)

content:
Great to keep track of my spending and due dates. Very quick and easy to 
put in transactions. When adding a note however you can not then just save. 
You need to go into a different field to get out of the notes field.

content:
Thank you for your prompt reply. Now I want to ask if I can transfer my 
apps data to another device without purchasing again?
replyContent: Of course you can. Just backup the data in Settings and then do a restore on the new device.

content: Just great apps

Finally....A well thought out financial tool to list, track and remind me of all my credit cards. Especially like the "Spending" tab that lists all cards and their used and available amounts on the same page.
replyContent: Glad that you like the app as well as myself! Thanks. Feel free to email me any suggestions for improvement.

content: I have been using the free version for a while, just upgraded to Pro version but my existing data are with the free version and the Pro version is empty! How can I transfer all data from free version to Pro version?
replyContent: Yup Pro version is a separate app so you need to do a data backup in the free version then do a data restore in the Pro version. This can be done in the in app Settings. Let me know if you have any more questions!

content: I just bought this app, so far so good. I have a question: how do you record an installment? for example $24000 for 12 month, should I just input transaction myself $2000 and have to remember to input $2000 every next month, or can it be done automatically by inputting $24000 for 12 month and it adds up automatically $2000 every month, which also will deduct the available limit everymonth. Please respond to this.
replyContent: Hi thanks for your support! Create a transaction with amount $2000 and set Repeat to 12. It will automatically appear in your transaction list every month without doing anything. Note that it will instantly take up $24000 immediately from your available credit limit since it is an instalment. Drop me an email if you have more questions! Cheers

content: Good app.
Not reading my SMS. Manually entering transactions are a pain
replyContent: Since you mentioned in your email that it is working now can you update your review with more stars please :)

content: Very good app to monitor your credit card transactions and their due date. 1. Hope there's a feature to monitor the points that comew with the card as well. 2. Combined credit limit for multiple cards. (For 2 cards that share credit limit) 3. Installment feature that is easier to type in. 4. Multiple currency for credit cards that can be used as dollar, Yuan, Peso etc.

content: Very useful if you have multiple credit cards
replyContent: Thanks for your kind words!

content: Great app but needs a few more features
replyContent: What are the features you have in mind? Feel free to send me an email to discuss.

content: Hey it does not monitor my messages??? So it does not enter detail automatically..which means I am doing.. what the pro app should be doing..any help here??
replyContent: Make sure you have enabled it in the Settings, and provided last 4 digit number for your card, and it should start monitoring. Try restarting your phone as the last resort. If it is still not working please send me an email so that I can provide support. Thanks!

content: Too many unnecessary steps when adding transactions. 1. Why are categories compulsory? Even if necessary, there should at least be a default option (like 'Misc') for on-the-go users, same as the date section which puts 'Today'. Every additional tap makes it less of a lightweight, handy manager and more of a tedious desktop program. 2. NO WIDGET to quickly add a transaction to a card. Instead I have to tap on the app, tap on the add transaction icon at the top, tap to select a card, tap to select a category ... this is just PAINFUL. At the very least enable Tasker / Automate APIs for users to create their own widgets / shortcuts.
replyContent: Hey thanks for the feedbacks I really appreciate it. No one ever told me about the inconvenience of making categories compulsory before and what you said makes sense. Will work on making categories optional. Widget is something that I had thought about but have been put aside because there aren't much requests, will definitely revisit it! Cheers

content: When making an installment transaction, for example, 12,000 for 12 months, you should make a recurring charge of 1000 x 12. Now this should be be deducted immediately from the Credit Limit. Please make that possible. That is different from having a simple recurring charge like a monthly subscription which should not affect the credit limit unless the charge is already posted.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! Will work on this first thing in the new year :)

content: Would be great if: 1) there's combined credit limit between cards, since nowadays most banks issued 2 cards but with one total combined limit 2) i know its already stated that backup will be without photos, but if without photos, then it only reaches 50% of the backup purpose...  3) if it can scan past/old/previous transactions/sms With these 3 items added, all headaches gone/all unbalance expenses will be settled, can refer back anytime & recorded safely here, i will give 5 stars... 10stars also can...
replyContent: Please send me an email regarding the backup issue so that I van follow up. As for the photos it is currently saved to sdcard so you may backup to files anytime but you are right currently there's no auto backup for photos yet. Thanks

content: After using this app for a few months I've bought the pro version. It's very helpful. It would be nice if the currency could be set per card.

content: Hope this app can generate pdf file for each card transactions.

Unreal...paid for the upgrade, built up the app with tons of transactions...lost everything as the app would not open...had to uninstall and reload it...pisses me off trying to restore as I only had backed up since Oct 17...app should have an auto back up daily setting. Waste of money...save yours!
replyContent: I am sorry this had happened to you. I will definitely push for implementing the auto backup feature. For now please backup frequently using the manual backup.

content: Almost there, but a bit rough around the edges. For example, the handling of the statement dates and payment due by (cut-off date) is too simple. The app presumes that the dates entered in the Card Setup applies to the current month. This is problematic if you have a nil opening balance. When you start entering transactions as there is no field for an opening balance, the app presumes a payment is due one month early. It isn't due until the next month. I can't tell the app the correct date to start from as one can only enter the day, not the month. Needs more work.
replyContent: The problem you are facing should happen only for the first month, and subsequent month shouldn't be a problem anymore. For the first month just mark the payment as settled and let it pass. To set opening balance just create an arbitrary transaction with the amount that you want, right at the start. Do send me an email if you have more questions.

My problem is, I can't get it to  Work automatically. I read you could import from the free version and I couldn't. You manually put the data in, so the App doesn't do anything , You do all the work. How do I get a refund

I'll give some thought into this, maybe by introducing backup pin.

My goal is to create the best credit card manager in the planet and there are still a few more features I would like to add to make it even better. Thanks for your encouragement!
